content.description: pins and bolts up the front face. could go free for sure. we aided with some free moves mixed in. fair amount of space in between bolts, so stick clip will be very helpful if your aiding. stellar little needle. the rock quality is excellent. tom gilje gave us the beta on this one. thanks tom. have no info on FA.
content.protection: 6 carabiners or draws. two older bolt anchor on top.
content.location: the needle is up on the left wall at the mouth of the canyon. enter into canyon and cut up left as soon as possible on a faint trail. (NOT up the first major wash on your left). gain the ridge line on your right and hike up to the wall. once there head left for a few minutes to the base of the tower. the tower is barely visible from cable arch parking area or from the first pull out past gatherer canyon. it's right of the huge light colored scar.

content.description: Climb the super splitter via aid to the very chossy summit. This climb isn't very good, but if you are looking for remote summits and high adventure you may enjoy your self.
content.protection: Many small cams and a couple of standard angles.
content.location:
This is a tower located in the back of gather canyon on the left if you are looking up canyon.

Rappel from summit bolts to the ground.
